messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS FL
messages.msgSnippet:
Denese, Can you please tell me what dates they are having the homeschooling day at
the space center? Thanks Heidi in NC ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Denese,
Can you please tell me what dates they are having the homeschooling day at
the space center? Thanks
Heidi in NC
-------Original Message-------

From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 19, 2002 6:18:00 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS FL

Kelli, I just got some information today about a homeschooling day at the
Kennedy Space Center in March. So if you have any that would be interested
in that kind of thing, March may be a good time . It's not as hot as July or
August:)
Denese
----- Original Message -----
From: Kelli Traaseth
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 19, 2002 11:52 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS



Oh..maybe I should go in March!<g>
Kelli
Denese Kolb <DCOLB@...> wrote:
I will be in Orlando in march from the 2nd thru the 9th lets meet...maybe
at
Sea world??
Have a great day
Heidi

That sounds like fun. Are you guys coming to do the theme park thing?
Denese
Yes but it doesnt go down in the 30s and stay there for days on end, at
lease not what I have heard about the orlando area. I want to be within
an
hour of Sea World! Where are you at?
Heidi

Well, you have to put that into perspective. It is usually so steamy and
hot here, that when it does get into the 30's, (which it does,
occasionally)
it is extremely cold to us. Even the 50's are cold to native or
naturalized
Floridaians. I am about an hour south of Sea World,(love it there, we have
anual passes) on the Space Coast. Florida is great, come on down, lots of
homeschoolers and unschoolers too:)
Denese
-------Original Message-------

From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 19, 2002 9:54:42 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS




Sorry about the last post I just hit the wrong key and it was gone..
anyway
I am Heidi I live in eastern NC, wanta move really bad to FLA

Hey, it gets cold here:)
Denese
and have
warmth all the time but ...whenever my hubby decides its time,(sure
wih
he
would make up his mind already)
this is our 7th year homeschooling and I am so glad to learn that how
I
have
been doing it is not me being lazy its called "unschooling" ! I thank
you
all for that. I have allot to learn and I thank you all again for
helping
me
Have a grat day!
Heidi

-------Original Message-------

From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 19, 2002 9:23:55 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: about the internet, and unschooling,
and





> Folks who still don't use books will probably never understand how
wonderful
> the internet is. In my mind it's just another VERY large library at
my
> fingertips!!!!
>
>

Cindy--
Exactly! I worked with a woman who HATED the computer. She
complained,

"All I do is READ!!
Mary J

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS FL
messages.msgSnippet: Kelli, I just got some information today about a homeschooling day at the Kennedy Space Center in March. So if you have any that would be interested in that
messages.messageBody:
Kelli, I just got some information today about a homeschooling day at the Kennedy Space Center in March. So if you have any that would be interested in that kind of thing, March may be a good time . It's not as hot as July or August:)
Denese
----- Original Message -----
From: Kelli Traaseth
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 19, 2002 11:52 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS



Oh..maybe I should go in March!<g>
Kelli
Denese Kolb <DCOLB@...> wrote:
I will be in Orlando in march from the 2nd thru the 9th lets meet...maybe at
Sea world??
Have a great day
Heidi

That sounds like fun. Are you guys coming to do the theme park thing?
Denese
Yes but it doesnt go down in the 30s and stay there for days on end, at
lease not what I have heard about the orlando area. I want to be within an
hour of Sea World! Where are you at?
Heidi

Well, you have to put that into perspective. It is usually so steamy and
hot here, that when it does get into the 30's, (which it does, occasionally)
it is extremely cold to us. Even the 50's are cold to native or naturalized
Floridaians. I am about an hour south of Sea World,(love it there, we have
anual passes) on the Space Coast. Florida is great, come on down, lots of
homeschoolers and unschoolers too:)
Denese

Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BOOKS




Sorry about the last post I just hit the wrong key and it was gone..
anyway
I am Heidi I live in eastern NC, wanta move really bad to FLA

Hey, it gets cold here:)
Denese
and have
warmth all the time but ...whenever my hubby decides its time,(sure wih
he
would make up his mind already)
this is our 7th year homeschooling and I am so glad to learn that how I
have
been doing it is not me being lazy its called "unschooling" ! I thank
you
all for that. I have allot to learn and I thank you all again for
helping
me
Have a grat day!
Heidi
